mapper.select: SELECT exam_id, exam_nm, exam_state, exam_date, lidx_id FROM exam WHERE exam_id = #{examId}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM (SELECT e.exam_id, e.exam_nm, e.exam_state, e.exam_date, l.les_id, l.les_cont, li.lidx_id, li.lidx_cont, l.tch_id FROM lesson l, lesson_index li, exam e, pay p WHERE l.les_id = li.les_id AND e.lidx_id = li.lidx_id AND p.les_id = l.les_id AND p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY SUBSTR(e.exam_id,4)) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 * (#{page} - 1) + 1 AND #{page} * 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lesson l, lesson_index li, exam e, pay p WHERE l.les_id = li.les_id AND e.lidx_id = li.lidx_id AND p.les_id = l.les_id AND p.user_id = #{userId}
